english.segment1: Fast lane, sane, insane this world is running. And I'm walking with a cane. Seek, seek you can be unique. But whatever you do don't let your inside out. But I've got to take a leak
english.segment2: And I know You're alive. And you know I will always try. I could never care less about. What this world has to offer if the price is to die. I'll keep my human spirit alive
english.segment3: Man I'm so weak. Come on over here I'll let you have a peek. Inside my heart cause you're the one I seek. I know I'm slow but wherever I go. I hear your steps echo
english.segment4: And I know You're alive. And I'll give my heart to survive. This world has nothing to offer a human soul. Reaching for the sky. So Father of light. Keep my human spirit alive
english.segment5: Will I try to hide away in the secret space of my heart. Will I try in time. Will I try with my feet on the ground of shadows. But my hands towards the light. Will I try in time
english.segment6: Your eyes. Are always there. Your eyes. Are what I came for
english.segment7: Your eyes. Drive away my fear. Your eyes. I could just stand there and adore
english.segment8: Stop just right there. Everything has to stop to steal time. For whom I want to be near. Yes I do care and I love the love we share
english.segment9: And I know You're alive. I'll give my heart to survive. This world has nothing to offer a human soul. Reaching for the sky. So Father of light. Keep this human spirit alive
english.segment11: Seems there is nothing to remind me of peace down here. So how come that all I feel is joy
